docs.lead_paragraph: Women who have trouble metabolizing folic acid are at a higher risk of having children with Down syndrome, researchers at the Food and Drug Administration reported today. The discovery raises the question of whether folic acid supplements might fight the syndrome.
docs.abstract: FDA researchers report that women who have trouble metabolizing folic acid are at higher risk of having children with Down's syndrome (S)
